tool_description: Scans customer activity patterns for potential fraudulent behavior that could affect point awards.

activity_window_days.description: Number of days to analyze for patterns

risk_threshold.description: Risk sensitivity level: low, medium, high

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer must exist in the loyalty program.
Invalid activity_window_days: Must be positive integer between 1 and 365.
Invalid risk_threshold: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Insufficient activity data: Not enough activity data to perform meaningful fraud analysis.
usage: Provide customer_id to scan for fraudulent patterns. Optionally adjust activity_window_days and risk_threshold for sensitivity.

risk_level.description: Risk classification: low, medium, high, or critical

suspicious_activities.description: List of detected suspicious activity patterns

recommendation.description: Recommended action: approve, review, or block

scan_timestamp.description: When the fraud scan was performed
